ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 329
ygData.msgSnippet: catapults are an as of yet useless item, in so far as all they do is sit in your ranged weapon slot with no discernable use. They do make a great and
ygData.messageBody:
catapults are an as of yet useless item, in so far as all they do is sit in
your ranged weapon slot with no discernable use. They do make a great and
relatively cheap way to raise your tinkering skill however.

I foubnd the recipe at www.eqportal.com/tinkering

great site
----- Original Message -----
From: Yippee38 <yippee38@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2000 11:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 329


> I've been checking the web sites and have yet to find what the catapults
are. I
> assume they are a weapon. If so, what kind? If not, please set me
straight.
>
> Also, is it true that tinkered cams cannot be used in bowyering?
>
> Thanks,
> Gwendlethop
> Cazic-Thule
>

you
